venue.name: Mt Cabot Via The N. Unknown Pond TH

item.description:
MT CABOT SUN 8/2/09 VIA Unknown Pond, Kilkenney Ridge trails -approx 12 miles RT

just over 3,000' elev gain and including The Horn and The Bulge
(which are on NE Highest 100 List).

Start at Unknown Pond Trail from Mill Brook Road just off Rte 110 in Stark NH.


Allow 8-9 hours depending on trail conditions and the overall pace of the
group. This is a strenuous hike and is not for beginners. Pace will be moderate with brief water/layering/snack breaks along the way but longer
rest breaks at each peak. Bring plenty of water, high energy foods and layering/water resistant/wickable clothing that can handle changing weather conditions in mountainous terrain and a headlamp or flashlight.

MEETING TIMES
Carpool 6:00 AM Hannaford parking lot Exit 14/Concord NH
Trailhead 8:45 AM Unknown Pond Trailhead off
Mill Brook Rd/Stark NH

DIRECTIONS:
Take NH 110 just east of the village of Stark to Mill Brook
Road and follow Mill Brook road (a long dirt road) south 3.7 miles to a WMNF
gate. Walk another .8 miles and look for a trail sign on the
left.



Climb along this trail until you reach Unknown Pond (in the vicinity of the tentsites) 3.3 miles from gate)and an intersection with the Kilkenny Ridge Trail at the Base of The Horn. Take Kilkenny Ridge Trail to the Horn and then further on over the Bulge and, finally, to the wooded summit of Mt.
Cabot. Return the same way.


HIKE LEADER dianeking2008@comcast.net Diane King
Deadline to RSVP Friday 7/31 6:00 PM
Limit 9 We will not wait at the carpool/trailhead for maybes.



GETTING TO STARK NH - note street numbers are approximated)
From: 25 Fort Eddy Rd, Concord, NH 03301-7405 US
To: 50 Millbrook Rd, Stark, NH 03582-6412 US

A) 25 Fort Eddy Rd, Concord, NH 03301-7405 US

1. Start out going SOUTH on FORT EDDY RD toward NH-9/LOUDON RD/WORLD WAR II VETERANS MEMORIAL BRIDGE. (go 0.1 miles)
2. Turn RIGHT onto ramp. (go 0.3 miles)
3. Merge onto I-93 N. (go 73.8 miles)
4. Merge onto US-3 N via EXIT 35 toward TWIN MOUNTAIN/LANCASTER. (go 18.8 miles)
5. Turn SLIGHT RIGHT onto US-3/LANCASTER RD/NH-116/UNION ST/DANIEL WEBSTER HWY. Continue to follow US-3/DANIEL WEBSTER HWY. (go 9.2 miles)
6. Turn SLIGHT RIGHT onto US-3/MAIN ST/DANIEL WEBSTER HWY. Continue to follow US-3/DANIEL WEBSTER HWY. (go 9.0 miles)
7. Turn RIGHT onto NH-110/BERLIN-GROVETON HWY.
7. Turn RIGHT onto NH-110/BERLIN-GROVETON HWY. Continue to follow NH-110. (go 7.2 miles)
8. Turn RIGHT onto MILLBROOK RD. (go 4.0 miles)
9. End at 50 Millbrook Rd Stark, NH 03582-6412

B) 50 Millbrook Rd, Stark, NH 03582-6412 US
2 hours 30 minutes | 122.36 miles -we are allowing a few minutes extra for a driving break or two..
item.name: MT CABOT VIA Unknown Pond
